description: Identifies what's being swept under the rug — inconvenient facts, counterexamples, or complications that are suspiciously absent. Detects strategic omissions that simplify narratives at the cost of accuracy.
researcher_question: What inconvenient facts are being swept under the rug?

omissions.omission_type: missing_counterexample | absent_stakeholder | excluded_data | unasked_question | definitional_exclusion | inconvenient_fact
omissions.what_is_missing: string - clear description of the omission
omissions.why_relevant: string - why this should be present
omissions.evidence_of_omission: string - how we know this is absent (not just forgotten)
who_benefits: string - stakeholders advantaged by this omission
omissions.omission_confidence: number (0-1) - confidence this is strategic vs. accidental

missing_counterexamples.claimed_pattern: string - the general claim being made

absent_perspectives.relevance: string - why they should be heard
absent_perspectives.inconvenience: string - what they would likely say that complicates things

excluded_scopes.what_excluded: string - specific scope that's left out
excluded_scopes.convenience_rating: number (0-1) - how convenient is this exclusion

unasked_questions.the_question: string - the obvious follow-up not asked
unasked_questions.why_obvious: string - why this question naturally arises
unasked_questions.likely_answer: string - what the answer would probably reveal
unasked_questions.avoidance_benefit: string - who benefits from not asking

meta.beneficiary_pattern: string - who consistently benefits from omissions

extraction.core_question: What inconvenient facts are being swept under the rug?

consolidation_rules: CONSOLIDATE OMISSIONS: - Merge similar omissions across articles
IDENTIFY SYSTEMATIC PATTERNS: - What's NEVER mentioned across the collection?
MAP BENEFICIARIES: - Who consistently benefits from what's left out?
ASSESS DISCOURSE INTEGRITY: - How much of the "floor" is actually "rug"?
PRIORITIZE REVELATIONS: - Which omissions, if addressed, would most change conclusions?

id_examples.to: Omitted: Labor displacement costs in automation discussion
Omitted: Global South manufacturing workers' perspectives
